column2: ## Get map data and clean up iso codes
## Get a list of countries that have complete inventories
[38;5;232m`summarise()` has grouped output by 'iso', 'country'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.[39m
geom_polygon(data = map, aes(x=long, y = lat, group=group, fill=coverage),color="#636363",size=0.2,na.rm=T) +
labs(subtitle = paste0("GHG inventory submissions under the latest Biennial Transparency Reports"),
caption = "âŒ‚ Data: UNFCCC, Tidy GHG inventories   âŒ‚ CC-BY William F. Lamb \nâŒ‚ Note: Partial indicates missing years since 1990; not submitted includes incorrectly formatted CRTs",
